default.markup: What if you could reset your skin in just one night?  Everyday our skin is exposed to an array of environmental aggressors, making it appear dull, dry, and lackluster. Care for your skin at night when skin renewal is most active. The Immortelle Overnight Reset Oil-in-Serum is applied before you sleep for skin that looks rested in just one night.

fr-CA.markup:
Et si vous pouviez régénérer votre peau en une nuit seulement?
Chaque jour, la peau est exposée à divers environnements agressifs qui lui donnent un aspect terne et sec. Prenez soin de votre peau pendant la nuit, qui est la période la plus active de renouvellement cellulaire. Appliquez le Sérum Huile réparateur de nuit avant de vous coucher et votre peau retrouvera un aspect reposé en une nuit seulement.
fr-CA.source:

c_OCC_CallCenterDescription.default: What if you could reset your skin in just one night?      Everyday our skin is exposed to an array of environmental aggressors, making it appear dull, dry, and lackluster. Care for your skin at night when skin renewal is most active. The new Immortelle Overnight Reset Oil-in-Serum is applied before you sleep for skin that looks rested in just one night.      Suitable For:      - All skin types      - All ages (start in your 20's)      Benefits:      After 1 Night, you look more rested*      After 7 Nights, you look revitalized*      After 28 Nights, you look transformed*      *Consumer tests on 115 women
